item.description: They're baaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaack! ~~~ Our Drop-In Classes were a huge hit last summer, and as we have had some space donated for the chilly winter months, will resume this month! ~~~ These classes will focus on great manners and address issues like jumping, barking and mouthing, as well as the steps to the Canine Good Citizen Test, therapy dog prep and even touch on steps to the public access test (which service dogs take). As always, we'll throw in some fun tricks, a great way to get nay-sayers to warm up to your bully! ~~~ Requirements for this class: a 4-6 foot leather or nylone leash (NO flexi/extendable leashes - if you bring one, you will be rented a fixed lead for $5); a supply of bite-sized, SUPER high value training treats (cheese, hot dog, real meat); a hungry dog (probably skip breakfast) and a confident attitude! ~~~ Cost will be $15. ~~~ No overly dog/human aggressive dogs at this class: if that is an issue you are working on, contact myself at justcassie101@gmail.com or Barbara Jean Crehan at rsa-901@hotmail.com. We are happy to help.
item.name: CGC/Better Breed Ambassadors Drop-In Classes Resume!
